displayProperties.description: These items are character-bound. This means that each character discovers them uniquely.

displayProperties.name: Total resets
displayProperties.description: In an effort to better match other Braytech data, total resets counts only those since and inclusive of Season 4

displayProperties.name: Win streak
displayProperties.description: Win streaks are calculated by loading match history, post game carnage reports, for each of your characters.

displayProperties.name: Wins until rank
displayProperties.description:
Number of matches required to achieve the displayed milestone rank assuming a constant streak of the displayed.

This means that if you have a streak of 1, it is assumed that you will maintain a streak of 1 with no losses.
